thread.section_title: Hotel Banke - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel with friendly staff and a great location!
thread.title_full: Nice hotel with friendly staff and a great location! - Review of Hotel Banke, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: dinoimhof
title: Nice hotel with friendly staff and a great location!
text: The hotel is located at a great location and offers good connections by metro to most places...the staff is really friendly and helpful...we had a really good stay there and I definitely recommend this hotel!
